scripts.build: pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd frontend && pnpm install && cd ../backend && pnpm install
scripts.typecheck: cd frontend && pnpm typecheck && cd ../backend && pnpm typecheck
scripts.test: cd frontend && pnpm test && cd ../backend && pnpm test
scripts.clean: rm -rf frontend/dist frontend/node_modules backend/dist backend/node_modules node_modules
